snippet.title: How to Evaluate a piecewise function
snippet.description:
Learn how to evaluate a piecewise function. A piecewise function is a function which uses different rules for different intervals. When evaluating a piecewise function, pay attention to the constraints of each function as you can only evaluate for the equation which falls within the constraint. i.e. when evaluating a piecewise function, first identify the part of the contraints where the argument of the function you want to evaluate falls then use the equation given for the suitable constraint to evaluate the function.
#functions #piecewisefunctions
tags: evaluate piecewise function at given value
